name: KFintech CAS Mailback Automation
title: KFintech CAS Mailback Automation

api_list.name: Request eCAS
api_list.description: API to automatically submit CAS Mailback request form on https://mfs.kfintech.com/investor/General/ConsolidatedAccountStatement
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kfintech-cas-mailback-automation.p.rapidapi.com/request_ecas"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kfintech-cas-mailback-automation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
